title: GET_IS_PLAYER_DRIVING_ON_HIGHWAY
content:
0x5FC472C501CCADB30x46E7E31D// GetIsPlayerDrivingOnHighway
BOOL GET_IS_PLAYER_DRIVING_ON_HIGHWAY(Player playerId);Parameters:playerId: The local index of the player to check (see PLAYER_ID)Returns: Returns a boolean value representing if the player is driving on a highway.Examples:Lua-- Get and store the local player index
local playerId = PlayerId()

if GetIsPlayerDrivingOnHighway(playerId) then
    print("Player is driving on a highway!")
else
    print("Player is not driving on a highway.")
end
codeBlocks:
local player = source
-- Example usage for GET_IS_PLAYER_DRIVING_ON_HIGHWAY
GetIsPlayerDrivingOnHighway(player)
